title: Toyota promotes finance chief Kenta Kon as CEO in second leadership change in 3 years
summary_full: Toyota Motor has announced that its chief executive Koji Sato will step down, and be replaced by the automaker’s chief financial officer, Kenta Kon.
summary_public: Toyota Motor has announced that its chief executive Koji Sato will step down, and be replaced by the automaker’s chief financial officer, Kenta Kon.
